title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: October 30, 2023, 08:11:55 PMLast edit: August 27, 2024, 01:07:16 AM by minerjones
content: For sale is Set #1 of the Bitcoin Poker 2020 chipsThis is a 1-of-5 set!!All 2100 chips assembled for this were funded in 1 transaction from BTCC products:https://mempool.space/tx/eb2cdcb47cdf157e25f0df3dbe661c760e4f5a3e8137a01d8116e4375265ee2eComes with 300x chips + case + 9-chip "S1" set + COAs that have the full addresses for all chips in the set300 chips:100x white - 1k sats100x red - 5k sats¬†50x green - 25k sats¬†50x black - 100k satsLoad of 300 chips: 0.0685BTCLoad of 9 chip set: 0.00444BTCAsking: 0.5BTC

comments.author: stackinsats777
comments.body: Love these poker chip sets! Wish I had the sats for it

comments.author: goldlyre

comments.body: Are the Set 1 of 300 pc the buyer-funded coins?Can we see how they're looked at naked state?They're great, anyway.Quote from: goldlyre on October 31, 2023, 01:37:47 AMThey're great, anyway.I'd overlooked the asking price of .5 BTC at the bottom.What are its size and weight?Quote from: goldlyre on October 31, 2023, 01:33:47 AMAre the Set 1 of 300 pc the buyer-funded coins?Can we see how they're looked at naked state?I see. They're in sats, not in bits.

comments.author: Tibu
comments.body: Hey guys, Sorry for the off-topic. Imagine I'm able to load the poker chip with the real sats value, like a bearer poker chip. Would it be interesting for you? I mean, not with a removable holo stickers. But with a real chip inside that can handle private keys. And a mobile app that allow you to on-load / off-load your tokens.Speaking out loud... It's the first time I see such Poker set with Bitcoin denominations.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: Tibu on December 12, 2023, 07:06:59 PMHey guys, Sorry for the off-topic. Imagine I'm able to load the poker chip with the real sats value, like a bearer poker chip. Would it be interesting for you? I mean, not with a removable holo stickers. But with a real chip inside that can handle private keys. And a mobile app that allow you to on-load / off-load your tokens.Speaking out loud... It's the first time I see such Poker set with Bitcoin denominations.sent you a message on twitter about this.

comments.body: Quote from: Steeley on December 13, 2023, 01:30:43 AMI love the hologram on these. Agreed.. some good stuff. We used the design of "Soul of Satoshi" created by collector/maker tothemoonsandsHe had made the design "open use"... and it was also used for a line of shirts I made back in 2016
